actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Safety.

official_title: To establish the National Workplace Safety Commission, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the National Workplace Safety Commission. Directs the Commission to: (1) investigate all workplace accidents resulting in the death of three or more persons; (2) report and make recommendations for changes in occupational safety and health standards based upon such investigations; (3) transmit such reports to the Congress, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration, and the Mine Safety and Health Administration; and (4) make such reports available to the public.

titles.title: To establish the National Workplace Safety Commission, and for other purposes.
